channel.title: dev on Rogers
channel.description: Recent content in dev on Rogers

item.title: Protocol-buffers with golang
item.description: 1.Install protoc use apt sudo apt install protoc or download release from github direct, here i use ubuntu, for other platform, visit protocol wget https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/releases/download/v3.19.4/protoc-3.19.4-linux-x86_64.zip -o ${HOME}/.local/bin 2.install protoc-gen-go go install google.golang.org/protobuf/cmd/protoc-gen-go@latest go install google.golang.org/grpc/cmd/protoc-gen-go-grpc@latest 3.write example code 1syntax = "proto3"; 2 3option go_package = "proto/ecommerce"; 4package ecommerce; 5 6message ProductID { string value = 1; } 7 8message Product { 9 string id = 1; 10 string name = 2; 11 string description = 3; 12} 13 14service ProductInfo { 15 rpc addProduct(Product) returns (ProductID); 16 rpc getProduct(ProductID) returns (Product); 17} and put this in a proto folder
